title: 12/30/20 – HOUR 2 – J.J. Watt Gave A Great Speech To The Wrong Audience. PLUS, Danny Wuerffel
itunes:title: 12/30/20 – HOUR 2 – J.J. Watt Gave A Great Speech To The Wrong Audience. PLUS, Danny Wuerffel
description:
LaVar Arrington and T.J. Houshmandzadeh fill in for Dan Patrick and talk about J.J. Watt’s emphatic speech to the media but question if the former Defensive Player of the Year should have directed it to his teammates. Plus, they speak with Hall of Fame quarterback and Heisman Trophy winner Danny Wuerffel. The guys also question if athletes of today aren’t appreciative enough of the platform they have.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
